dishes.name: Mofongo Relleno de Camarones
dishes.description: Crispy fried green plantains mashed with garlic and olive oil, formed into a savory mound and stuffed with seasoned shrimp in a flavorful sauce

dishes.name: Arepas con Queso
dishes.description: Golden griddled cornmeal cakes with a crispy exterior and soft, fluffy interior, filled with melted cheese and brushed with butter

dishes.name: Tostones
dishes.description: Twice-fried green plantain slices seasoned with garlic and olive oil, creating crispy, golden discs with a tender center

dishes.name: Tembleque
dishes.description: A very smooth coconut pudding made with coconut milk and cornstarch, lightly sweetened and topped with cinnamon
